XII.i.2.A.1.
h
.
Review of STRs
A review of service treatment records (STRs) is required only when DIC cannot be granted based on the evidence of record.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - Ratings for Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
